author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

Also, the name seems very generic, would a more descriptive name be better? Maybe `ConsoleInput` or `TerminalInput`? See https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/v1/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1 .

@fredrikekre Thanks for your  reviewing.
I'm trying to rename my package to `ConsoleInput`. I edited `Project.toml`, root package's name, `using Input` at `test/runtests.jl`  and `src/Input.jl`(rename to src/ConsoleInput.jl), and ran test, then I got
```
(ConsoleInput) pkg> test
   Testing ConsoleInput
 Resolving package versions...
ERROR: LoadError: KeyError: key ConsoleInput [0337ed0a-8a8f-11e9-18d0-bd2d7ac2b150] not found
Stacktrace:
 [1] getindex at ./dict.jl:478 [inlined]
 [2] root_module at ./loading.jl:898 [inlined]
 [3] require(::Base.PkgId) at ./loading.jl:864
 [4] require(::Module, ::Symbol) at ./loading.jl:853
 [5] include at ./boot.jl:326 [inlined]
 [6] include_relative(::Module, ::String) at ./loading.jl:1038
 [7] include(::Module, ::String) at ./sysimg.jl:29
 [8] include(::String) at ./client.jl:403
 [9] top-level scope at none:0
in expression starting at /Users/mild/private/julia/ConsoleInput/test/runtests.jl:1
ERROR: Package ConsoleInput errored during testing
```
I googled how to solve this, but I could not got helpful information.
What should I do?
You probably had `Input` still in the `Manifest.toml` file.

Thanks for advising. I solved my problem and recreate PR due to rename package name.
#1285
